title: fix for issue397 : TextScale not applied when changing themes

title: partial fix for issue378 - memory issues when recycling bitmaps.
message:
partial fix for issue378 - memory issues when recycling bitmaps.
- bitmaps allocated by the rendertheme are now recycled
- bitmaps are only reallocated if the size changes (with read/write lock)
- canvas is nulled out and reallocated after recycling bitmaps, see https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=8488
This still does not fully address all memory issues that mostly afflict Android versions < 3.0 where
bitmaps are allocacted outside the GC controlled storage.

title: fix for #358: retrieval of the position has been moved out of synchronized…
message:
fix for #358: retrieval of the position has been moved out of synchronized region, so that the deadlock
cannot reappear. This introduces a window where the position can change while redrawing, however, this
will be immediately be overdrawn, so the effect should not be be visible.
